page.title: 14ENTERTAINMENT
page.content: In Govan women usually{entertain themeselves by going to the{bingo. The pub or stay at home to watch the television. Children have quite a lot to do in this area, e.g. they have disco's which are usually held in the local community centre. You usually find boys playing{football}in the street. There is a pool hall where you can find people of all ages. The senior citizens go bus runs with the local community centre in the summertime and they have parties in the centre on special days e.g. Christmas. People can go to the pictures to entertain themeselves but they have to go into town as we don't have a picture hall in Govan area.
